divs: sighting detailsdriving from natchitoches ,la. to home new orleans,la.on i-49.spouse said what kind of airplane is that? trying to use all of my aviation and aerospace experiance to make a aircraft out of the craft ,trails,rotors,propellers,wings,empanase,sound,but the aerodynamcs was wrong and was anti gravity and using inisable cloaking or time portal.the craft were silver equalateral traingles,was first one ,then 2 more appeared,then three more appeared for a total of six in a flight formation.hoovering at a steady speed moving north then northeast slowly.then one of the craft in the slight right north by northeast reflected the morning sun light like polished alunium or mirror into my eyes and blinded me momentarily.after the slight turn to the north north east i figured good i will get to see the craft from the backside but then they vanished.personal theroy invisable cloaking or time portal or warp.1st trying to make sense of what i know about aircraft,two not possible with our technology,three wanted to get video camera of of trunk of car to video but thought by the time i would stop the car it and they would be gone.i was courious about the crafts envioment who was pilots,what propultion?,what was it made of ,then scared,realized we were seeing something extra ordinary,never thought i \ we would ever see anything out of this world.i and spouse never talked about it until 10 years later ,now i want anyone who will listen take note this was real as it gets.the objects disappeared into thin air.vanished.
Summary: 6 craft appear hover flt path with direction change,reflect sun light like mirror,disappear like time portal or cloaking device
trends: There have been no other sightings in alexanderia
This sighting has never been favorited.
